heading: Get the latest Firefox
paragraph: Firefox keeps what's personal private. You decide what to share and when, because your life is your business, not ours.

heading: Celebrating women and the web
paragraph: We asked women whose work we admire what they hope for women on the web. Here's what they had to say.

heading: Not all internet emergencies are equal
paragraph: Breaches, hacks, leaks and viruses are all serious security concerns. How you respond depends on the type of emergency you’re facing.

heading: Stop texting yourself links
paragraph: Pick up where you left off, from computer to mobile, by instantly sending tabs between devices without leaving your browser.

heading: The World’s 50 Most Innovative Companies
paragraph: Fast Company: How Mozilla moved fast to block Facebook and other privacy invaders from your web browser.

heading: The antidote to Big Tech?
paragraph: Some people believe that decentralization is the inevitable future of the web. But would it be as utopian as advocates suggest?

heading: Gender diversity and inclusion in tech
paragraph: Find out why a pair of entrepreneurs created a fake man to join their team and send emails on their behalf in this episode of IRL.

heading: Firefox Reality is coming to HoloLens 2
paragraph: We are excited to announce that we’re working with Microsoft to bring the immersive web to the HoloLens 2 mixed reality headset.

heading: Jingle Smash, a WebVR puzzler
paragraph: Go behind the scenes to see how Mozilla’s Josh Marinacci built Jingle Smash, a block smashing WebVR game.

heading: Build a nest of privacy and security
paragraph: In a connected world, the issues associated with insecure passwords and accounts will only increase. Take steps to protect your family.

heading: 2019 Common Voice dataset released
paragraph: We released the largest to-date public domain transcribed voice dataset, featuring 18 languages, 1,400 hours and 42k contributors.

heading: Protect yourself with Firefox Monitor
paragraph: Find out what hackers already know about you and get alerts when data breaches put you at risk.

heading: Are you a developer?
paragraph: Get the latest features, fast performance and the development tools you need to build for the open web with Firefox Developer Edition.
